descriptionHTML:
Unique handmade watch faces now is available.
Upgrade your smart watch now!

Key Features:
★ Realistic watch faces
Our watch faces are developed according to all modern requirements for 3D images. Shadows, highlights, gradients, halftones create the impression of traditional mechanical watches.

★ Unrivaled handmade design
Our watch faces have been created by the best designers in this field. As a result we have on of the best and most affordable watch faces that you can get today.

★ Night mode
The unique night mode adapts the image brightness of the watch face depending on the time of the day. It makes looking at the watch face really comfortable even in the complete darkness.

★ Burn-in protection
All watch faces are developed in such a way as to protect the screen of your watch from burn-in. We want your device to perform at its best!

★ Full ambient mode
Our watch faces remain perfectly functional and display the time correctly even when they are in the energy saving mode. The Google recommendations for prolonging their hours of operation are also taken into consideration.

Functions
Compatible with all Android Wear smart watches: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, Sony Smartwatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live, LG G Watch, LG Watch Urban and Huawei Watch.
The watch faces display the time, the date, the weather forecast and a compass (depending on the model).

Partner Program
Become our partner today! Do you have ideas for watch faces? Apply today and we will provide the full range of instructions on how to develop watch faces. Place them in our Market and receive your guaranteed high profits from every sale! Write to us at - partners@watchface.market
